Title: CERC Approves Interim Tariff Of ?3.62/kWh For DVC’s 8 MW Solar Project In West Bengal
Description: The Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (CERC) issued an order on March 20, 2025, regarding petition filed by the Damodar Valley Corporation (DVC). The petition sought the determination of a pro for an 8 MW Solar Project.

Title: TNPGCL to execute Ennore thermal power station expansion in India
Description: Tamil Nadu Power Generation Corporation (TNPGCL) has decided to execute the 660MW Ennore thermal power station expansion.

Title: NBCC Secures ₹650 Crore Infrastructure Projects in Uttarakhand and Delhi.
Description: NBCC has secured infrastructure projects in Uttarakhand and Delhi.

Title: EcoBox Industrial Parks acquires 50 acres for logistics project in Chennai
Description: EcoBox Industrial Parks acquires 50 acres for logistics project in Chennai

Title: Industrial Shed Project in Pune
Description: Musaddilal Properties Private Limited has applied for environmental clearance for a proposed industrial shed.

Title: UPSRTC proposes 54 bus stations for PPP development in Phase 2
Description: UPSRTC has identified 54 bus stations for development under Phase 2 of its PPP scheme and has sought government approval.

Title: Commercial Complex Near Azadpur Metro Station, Delhi
Description: Aggarwal Plaza Private Limited is seeking environmental clearance for the development of a commercial complex.

Title: Craftsman Automation to set up new factory in Hosur
Description: Craftsman Automation Ltd is investing Rs. 150 crore to establish a new manufacturing facility at SIPCOT Industrial Park.

Title: Systra bags contract to prepare CMP for Vijayawada and Visakhapatnam Metro Rail Project
Description: Systra has been awarded a contract to prepare a Comprehensive Mobility Plan (CMP) for the Vijayawada and Visakhapatnam Metro Rail projects. This involves planning and design work that will likely lead to construction requiring steel.

Title: Paras Wins Delhi Metro Golden Line’s Track Work Contract DT-10R
Description: Paras Railtech has been declared as the lowest bidder to install ballastless standard gauge tracks on Delhi Metro’s 23.622 km Golden Line (Line-10).

Title: L&T’s Delhi Metro TBM-3 Records Breakthrough at IGNOU Station
Description: Larsen & Toubro (L&T) today celebrated tunnel boring machine (TBM) DZ1125’s breakthrough at IGNOU Station.

Title: HCC – Tata JV Awarded Indore Metro’s Underground Contract IN-05R
Company: Hindustan Construction Co. Ltd. – Tata Projects Ltd. (HCC – TPL JV)
Description: Hindustan Construction Co. Ltd. – Tata Projects Ltd. (HCC – TPL JV) has been awarded Indore Metro’s Underground Contract IN-05R.

Title: GRIL Wins Agra – Gwalior Expressway’s Construction Contract
Description: GR Infraprojects Ltd. (GRIL) on Thursday was declared as the preferred bidder for the civil construction of 88.40 km Agra – Gwalior Expressway project…

Title: HCC – KEC JV Launches Chennai Metro Line-4 ECV-02’s Final U-Girder
Company: Hindustan Construction Company – KEC International (HCC – KEC JV)
Description: Hindustan Construction Company – KEC International (HCC – KEC JV) last week celebrated launching all 624 U-girders for Package C4-ECV02 of Chennai…

Title: Godrej Properties acquires land in Kharghar, Navi Mumbai for Rs 716.58-cr
Description: Godrej Properties acquires land for real estate development project.

Title: Waaree Renewable Tech secures Rs 232.30-cr order for 170 MW solar project
Description: Waaree Renewable Tech secures order for 170 MW solar project.

Title: Everhope Oncology to establish cancer care centres in India
Description: Everhope Oncology to establish cancer care centres in India.

Title: JNPA to develop corporate office building in Mumbai Port, Rs 1,000-cr outlay
Description: JNPA to develop corporate office building in Mumbai Port.

Title: GAIL, Coal India form JV for Coal-to-SNG project
Description: GAIL, Coal India form JV for Coal-to-SNG project

Title: Ceigall India Secures $111 Million Contract for Ludhiana Bypass
Description: Ceigall India Ltd has secured a contract from the National Highways Authority of India for the Ludhiana Bypass.

Title: Adani Secures $324M Transmission Contract for Gujarat Green Hydrogen
Description: Adani Energy Solutions wins ₹28 billion transmission project in Gujarat to support a green hydrogen/ammonia plant.

Title: NBCC Wins Rs 439 Crore Uttarakhand Contract, Rs 219 Crore Delhi Project
Description: NBCC (India) Ltd has bagged a Rs 439 crore contract from Uttarakhand Investment and Infrastructure Board (UIIDB) and a Rs 219 crore Delhi project.

Title: Cyclosystem Wins Bengaluru Metro Train Wash Plant Contract
Description: Cyclosystem India Pvt Ltd has secured the contract to supply automatic train wash plants for three depots under Bengaluru Metro.

Title: NBCC India shares rise over 2% after new Rs 45 crore PMC contract
Description: NBCC India secured a Rs 44.62 crore PMC contract for infrastructure development at MGIRI, Wardha.

Title: Ceigall India gains on bagging Rs 923 crore NHAI contract for southern Ludhiana Bypass
Description: Ceigall India received a letter of award from NHAI for the southern Ludhiana Bypass project.

Title: NCC shares jump 6% on Rs 2,130 crore Amaravati infrastructure contract win
Description: NCC secured an infrastructure development contract worth Rs 2,129.60 crore (excluding GST) in Amaravati.

Title: Ceigall India bags ₹923 crore NHAI contract for southern Ludhiana Bypass
Description: Ceigall India Ltd received a Letter of Award (LOA) from the National Highways Authority of India for the southern Ludhiana Bypass.

Title: IRCON Secures Rs 10.96 Bn EPC Contract for Meghalaya Secretariat
Description: IRCON International Ltd has won an Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) contract for the Meghalaya Secretariat.

Title: IRCON International secures ₹1,096 cr contract for constructing Secretariat complex in Shillong
Description: IRCON International has won a contract for constructing a Secretariat complex in Shillong, Meghalaya.

Title: Modine scores $180m contract from new AI data center customer
Description: Modine has been awarded a $180 million contract for 'Airedale by Modine' cooling systems from a new AI infrastructure customer.

Title: Akamai strikes $100M multi-year deal with tech giant
Description: Akamai expects continued growth in 2025, backed by a new data center, strong finances, and a promising cloud segment.

Title: Zelestra signs long-term contract to provide renewable energy in India
Description: Zelestra, a global multi-technology renewable energy company, has been awarded a Firm and Dispatchable Renewable Energy (FDRE) contract by Satluj Jal Vidyut.

Title: Adani Green Bags 1,250 MW Pumped Storage Contract from UPPCL
Description: Adani Green Energy has received a letter of award from the Uttar Pradesh Power Corporation (UPPCL) for a 1250 MW pumped hydro storage project (PSP).

Title: Zelestra Signs a Long-term Contract With SJVN to Supply Firm and Dispatchable Renewable Energy in India, Enabling the Construction of a Portfolio of 500 MW of Wind, Solar and Battery Storage Projects
Description: Zelestra, a global, multi-technology, customer-focused renewable energy company, has been awarded a Firm & Dispatchable Renewable Energy (FDRE) contract by SJVN

Title: HCC and Tata Projects win $252.9m contract for Indore Metro project in India
Company: HCC (Hindustan Construction Company) and Tata Projects
Description: The JV will be responsible for constructing an 11.32km-long tunnel and stations using TBMs for the Indore Metro project.

Title: DMRC wins ₹5,870 Crore O&M Contract for Chennai Metro Phase 2 Corridors
Description: Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) wins the operations and maintenance contract for Chennai Metro Rail Phase II corridors.

Title: Hindustan Construction Company-Tata Projects JV wins Rs 2,191 crore contract
Company: Hindustan Construction Company (HCC) and Tata Projects
Description: Hindustan Construction Company Ltd in a joint venture with Tata Projects Ltd secured a Rs 2191 crore contract from the Madhya Pradesh Metro Rail Corporation for Indore Metro.

Title: HCC Share Price Jumps 13% After Securing ₹2,470 Crore Tata Power Contract
Company: Hindustan Construction Company (HCC) and Tata Projects
Description: Hindustan Construction Company (HCC) shares surged 13.3% after its joint venture with Tata Projects won a ₹2470 crore contract for a pumped storage project.

Title: HMPL Wins Rs 1 Billion Steel Contract in Maharashtra
Description: Hazoor Multi Projects (HMPL) has been awarded a contract worth Rs 1.02 billion for steel-related works in Maharashtra.

Title: HCC-Tata Projects JV win Rs 2,191 cr contract for Indore Metro
Description: HCC-Tata Projects JV win Rs 2,191 cr contract for Indore Metro. HCC is engaged in Mumbai Metro Line III, with 4 km of twin tunnels and four stations, along with two Chennai Metro packages.

Title: PSP Projects Wins Major Ahmedabad Contracts Worth ₹1,764 Crore
Description: PSP Projects secured infrastructure and construction work orders worth ₹1,764.12 crore in Ahmedabad. The projects abar institutional and residential.

Title: GPT Infraprojects shares rally 14% on new contract deal worth Rs 481-cr
